0019c6  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1005
0019ca  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1005
0019cc  f80bc001          STRB     r12,[r11,r1]          ;1005
0019d0  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1006
0019d4  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1006
0019d6  f80b2000          STRB     r2,[r11,r0]           ;1006
0019da  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1007
0019de  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1007
0019e0  f80ba001          STRB     r10,[r11,r1]          ;1007
0019e4  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1008
0019e8  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1008
0019ea  f80b3000          STRB     r3,[r11,r0]           ;1008
0019ee  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1024
0019f2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1024
0019f4  f80b4001          STRB     r4,[r11,r1]           ;1024
0019f8  f89d1004          LDRB     r1,[sp,#4]            ;1029
0019fc  f8b8203c          LDRH     r2,[r8,#0x3c]         ;1029
001a00  4291              CMP      r1,r2                 ;1029
001a02  d147              BNE      |L1.6804|
001a04  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;1029
001a08  f8982038          LDRB     r2,[r8,#0x38]         ;1029
001a0c  4291              CMP      r1,r2                 ;1029
001a0e  d141              BNE      |L1.6804|
001a10  f89d1006          LDRB     r1,[sp,#6]            ;1029
001a14  f898202c          LDRB     r2,[r8,#0x2c]         ;1029
001a18  4291              CMP      r1,r2                 ;1029
001a1a  d13b              BNE      |L1.6804|
001a1c  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1031
001a20  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1031
001a22  f80b5000          STRB     r5,[r11,r0]           ;1031
001a26  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1032
001a2a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1032
001a2c  f80b7001          STRB     r7,[r11,r1]           ;1032
001a30  f04f023a          MOV      r2,#0x3a              ;1033
001a34  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1033
001a38  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1033
001a3a  f80b2000          STRB     r2,[r11,r0]           ;1033
001a3e  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1034
001a42  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1034
001a44  f80b5001          STRB     r5,[r11,r1]           ;1034
001a48  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1035
001a4c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1035
001a4e  f80b6000          STRB     r6,[r11,r0]           ;1035
001a52  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1036
001a56  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1036
001a58  f80b2001          STRB     r2,[r11,r1]           ;1036
001a5c  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1037
001a60  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1037
001a62  f80b5000          STRB     r5,[r11,r0]           ;1037
001a66  f80b9001          STRB     r9,[r11,r1]           ;1038
001a6a  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]            ;1039
001a6e  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0                 ;1039
001a72  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21              ;1039
001a76  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001a7a  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]            ;1040
001a7e  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1040
001a80  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;1040
001a82  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001a86  f89d0002          LDRB     r0,[sp,#2]            ;1041
001a8a  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1041
001a8c  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;1041
001a8e  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001a92  e4e4              B        |L1.5214|
                  |L1.6804|
001a94  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1045
001a98  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1045
001a9a  f80b4000          STRB     r4,[r11,r0]           ;1045
001a9e  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1046
001aa2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1046
001aa4  f80b5001          STRB     r5,[r11,r1]           ;1046
001aa8  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1047
001aac  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1047
001aae  f80b7000          STRB     r7,[r11,r0]           ;1047
001ab2  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1048
001ab6  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1048
001ab8  f80b6001          STRB     r6,[r11,r1]           ;1048
001abc  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1049
001ac0  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1049
001ac2  f80b4000          STRB     r4,[r11,r0]           ;1049
001ac6  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1050
001aca  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1050
001acc  f80b4001          STRB     r4,[r11,r1]           ;1050
001ad0  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1051
001ad4  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1051
001ad6  f80b5000          STRB     r5,[r11,r0]           ;1051
001ada  f80b9001          STRB     r9,[r11,r1]           ;1052
001ade  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]            ;1053
001ae2  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0                 ;1053
001ae6  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21              ;1053
001aea  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001aee  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]            ;1054
001af2  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1054
001af4  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;1054
001af6  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001afa  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1055
001afe  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;1055
001b00  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc               ;1055
001b02  d303              BCC      |L1.6924|
001b04  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1                 ;1055
001b08  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1055
                  |L1.6924|
001b0c  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;1056
001b10  488e              LDR      r0,|L1.7500|
001b12  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1056
001b14  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2       ;1056
001b18  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;1056
001b1a  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
001b1e  e49e              B        |L1.5214|
                  |L1.6944|
001b20  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1109
001b24  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1109
001b26  f80b4000          STRB     r4,[r11,r0]           ;1109
001b2a  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1110
001b2e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1110
001b30  f80b5001          STRB     r5,[r11,r1]           ;1110
001b34  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1111
001b38  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1111
001b3a  f80b7000          STRB     r7,[r11,r0]           ;1111
001b3e  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1112
001b42  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1112
001b44  f80b6001          STRB     r6,[r11,r1]           ;1112
001b48  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1113
001b4c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1113
001b4e  f80b4000          STRB     r4,[r11,r0]           ;1113
001b52  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1114
001b56  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1114
001b58  f80b4001          STRB     r4,[r11,r1]           ;1114
001b5c  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1115
001b60  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1115
001b62  f80b5000          STRB     r5,[r11,r0]           ;1115
001b66  f80b9001          STRB     r9,[r11,r1]           ;1116
001b6a  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]            ;1117
001b6e  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0                 ;1117
001b72  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21              ;1117
001b76  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001b7a  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]            ;1118
001b7e  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1118
001b80  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;1118
001b82  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001b86  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1119
001b8a  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;1119
001b8c  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc               ;1119
001b8e  d303              BCC      |L1.7064|
001b90  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1                 ;1119
001b94  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1119
                  |L1.7064|
001b98  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;1120
001b9c  486b              LDR      r0,|L1.7500|
001b9e  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1120
001ba0  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2       ;1120
001ba4  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;1120
001ba6  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
001baa  e458              B        |L1.5214|
;;;1125   
                          ENDP

                  community2lcd PROC
;;;1126   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1127   void community2lcd(char* in,
001bac  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;1128   			char xy,
;;;1129   			char flash_pos,
;;;1130   			char flash_on)
;;;1131   {
001bae  4604              MOV      r4,r0
001bb0  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001bb2  4616              MOV      r6,r2
001bb4  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;1132   char temp;
;;;1133   char i;
;;;1134   //char n;
;;;1135   
;;;1136   
;;;1137   i=find(xy);
001bb6  f7fffffe          BL       find
001bba  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;1138   
;;;1139   //in1=192;
;;;1140   
;;;1141   //in2=34;
;;;1142   
;;;1143   
;;;1144   
;;;1145   temp=i;
001bbc  4610              MOV      r0,r2
;;;1146   
;;;1147   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1148   if(temp!=255)
;;;1149   while (*in)
;;;1150   	{
;;;1151   	lcd_buffer[temp]=*in++;
001bbe  4d64              LDR      r5,|L1.7504|
001bc0  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff              ;1148
001bc2  d106              BNE      |L1.7122|
001bc4  e008              B        |L1.7128|
                  |L1.7110|
001bc6  5429              STRB     r1,[r5,r0]
001bc8  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
;;;1152   	temp++;
001bcc  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
001bd0  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.7122|
001bd2  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;1149
001bd4  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;1149
001bd6  d1f6              BNE      |L1.7110|
                  |L1.7128|
;;;1153       	}
;;;1154   
;;;1155   
;;;1156   
;;;1157   if((bFL2)&&(flash_on))
001bd8  485e              LDR      r0,|L1.7508|
001bda  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; bFL2
001bdc  2800              CMP      r0,#0
001bde  d006              BEQ      |L1.7150|
001be0  2f00              CMP      r7,#0
001be2  d004              BEQ      |L1.7150|
;;;1158   	{
;;;1159   	lcd_buffer[i+flash_pos]=95;
001be4  eb020106          ADD      r1,r2,r6
001be8  f04f005f          MOV      r0,#0x5f
001bec  5468              STRB     r0,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.7150|
;;;1160   	}
;;;1161   
;;;1162   }
001bee  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;1163   
                          ENDP

                  ip2lcd PROC
;;;1164   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1165   void ip2lcd(	short in1,
001bf0  e92d4ff0          PUSH     {r4-r11,lr}
;;;1166   			short in2,
;;;1167   			short in3,
;;;1168   			short in4,
;;;1169   			char xy,
;;;1170   			char flash_pos)
;;;1171   {
001bf4  4607              MOV      r7,r0
001bf6  e9dd0509          LDRD     r0,r5,[sp,#0x24]
001bfa  4688              MOV      r8,r1
001bfc  4691              MOV      r9,r2
001bfe  469a              MOV      r10,r3
;;;1172   char i;
;;;1173   //char n;
;;;1174   
;;;1175   //bin2bcd_int(in);
;;;1176   //bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
;;;1177   i=find(xy);
001c00  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1178   
;;;1179   //in1=192;
;;;1180   
;;;1181   //in2=34;
;;;1182   
;;;1183   if((flash_pos==1)&&(bFL2))
001c04  4b53              LDR      r3,|L1.7508|
;;;1184   	{
;;;1185   	lcd_buffer[i-12]=' ';
001c06  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
001c08  4c51              LDR      r4,|L1.7504|
;;;1186   	lcd_buffer[i-13]=' ';
;;;1187   	lcd_buffer[i-14]=' ';
;;;1188   	}
;;;1189   else 
;;;1190   	{
;;;1191   	lcd_buffer[i-12]=0x30+(in1%10);
001c0a  220a              MOVS     r2,#0xa
;;;1192   	lcd_buffer[i-13]=0x30+(in1/10)%10;
;;;1193   	lcd_buffer[i-14]=0x30+(in1/100);
001c0c  f04f0c64          MOV      r12,#0x64
001c10  2d01              CMP      r5,#1                 ;1183
001c12  d109              BNE      |L1.7208|
001c14  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]            ;1183  ; bFL2
001c16  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.7208|
001c18  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;1185
001c1c  f1a6060e          SUB      r6,r6,#0xe            ;1185
001c20  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]            ;1185
001c22  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]            ;1186
001c24  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]            ;1187
001c26  e017              B        |L1.7256|
                  |L1.7208|
001c28  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2             ;1191
001c2c  fb027e1b          MLS      lr,r2,r11,r7          ;1191
001c30  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;1191
001c34  f10e0e30          ADD      lr,lr,#0x30           ;1191
001c38  f806ec0c          STRB     lr,[r6,#-0xc]         ;1191
001c3c  fb9bfef2          SDIV     lr,r11,r2             ;1192
001c40  fb02bb1e          MLS      r11,r2,lr,r11         ;1192
001c44  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30         ;1192
001c48  f806bc0d          STRB     r11,[r6,#-0xd]        ;1192
001c4c  fb97f7fc          SDIV     r7,r7,r12
001c50  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001c54  f8067c0e          STRB     r7,[r6,#-0xe]
                  |L1.7256|
;;;1194   	}
;;;1195   
;;;1196   if((flash_pos==2)&&(bFL2))
001c58  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
001c5a  d109              BNE      |L1.7280|
001c5c  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001c5e  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.7280|
;;;1197   	{
;;;1198   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=' ';
001c60  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001c64  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001c68  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;1199   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=' ';
001c6a  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;1200   	lcd_buffer[i-10]=' ';
001c6c  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
001c6e  e017              B        |L1.7328|
                  |L1.7280|
;;;1201   	}
;;;1202   else 
;;;1203   	{
;;;1204   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=0x30+(in2%10);
001c70  fb98f7f2          SDIV     r7,r8,r2
001c74  fb028b17          MLS      r11,r2,r7,r8
001c78  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001c7c  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001c80  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30
001c84  f886b002          STRB     r11,[r6,#2]
;;;1205   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=0x30+(in2/10)%10;
001c88  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2
001c8c  fb02771b          MLS      r7,r2,r11,r7
001c90  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001c94  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1206   	lcd_buffer[i-10]=0x30+(in2/100);
001c96  fb98f7fc          SDIV     r7,r8,r12
001c9a  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001c9e  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.7328|
;;;1207   	}
;;;1208   
;;;1209   if((flash_pos==3)&&(bFL2))
001ca0  2d03              CMP      r5,#3
001ca2  d109              BNE      |L1.7352|
001ca4  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001ca6  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.7352|
;;;1210   	{
;;;1211   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=' ';
001ca8  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001cac  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
001cb0  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;1212   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=' ';
001cb2  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;1213   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=' ';
001cb4  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
001cb6  e017              B        |L1.7400|
                  |L1.7352|
;;;1214   	}
;;;1215   else 
;;;1216   	{
;;;1217   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=0x30+in3%10;
001cb8  fb99f7f2          SDIV     r7,r9,r2
001cbc  fb029817          MLS      r8,r2,r7,r9
001cc0  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001cc4  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
001cc8  f1080830          ADD      r8,r8,#0x30
001ccc  f8868002          STRB     r8,[r6,#2]
;;;1218   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=0x30+(in3/10)%10;
001cd0  fb97f8f2          SDIV     r8,r7,r2
001cd4  fb027718          MLS      r7,r2,r8,r7
001cd8  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001cdc  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1219   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=0x30+(in3/100);
001cde  fb99f7fc          SDIV     r7,r9,r12
001ce2  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001ce6  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.7400|
;;;1220   	}
;;;1221   
;;;1222   if((flash_pos==4)&&(bFL2))
001ce8  2d04              CMP      r5,#4
001cea  d109              BNE      |L1.7424|
001cec  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001cee  b13b              CBZ      r3,|L1.7424|
;;;1223   	{
;;;1224   	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';
001cf0  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
;;;1225   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=' ';
001cf2  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4
001cf4  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2
001cf8  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1226   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=' ';
001cfa  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]
                  |L1.7420|
;;;1227   	}
;;;1228   else 
;;;1229   	{
;;;1230   	lcd_buffer[i]=0x30+in4%10;
;;;1231   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=0x30+(in4/10)%10;
;;;1232   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=0x30+(in4/100);
;;;1233   	}
;;;1234   }
001cfc  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
                  |L1.7424|
001d00  fb9af1f2          SDIV     r1,r10,r2             ;1230
001d04  fb02a311          MLS      r3,r2,r1,r10          ;1230
001d08  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30           ;1230
001d0c  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]            ;1230
001d0e  fb91f3f2          SDIV     r3,r1,r2              ;1231
001d12  fb021113          MLS      r1,r2,r3,r1           ;1231
001d16  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4              ;1231
001d18  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2              ;1231
001d1c  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1231
001d20  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]            ;1231
001d22  fb9af1fc          SDIV     r1,r10,r12            ;1232
001d26  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1232
001d2a  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]            ;1232
001d2c  e7e6              B        |L1.7420|
;;;1235   
                          ENDP

                  checkboxing PROC
;;;1236   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1237   void checkboxing(char xy,short in)
001d2e  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1238   {
001d30  460c              MOV      r4,r1
;;;1239   char i;
;;;1240   i=find(xy);
001d32  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1241   if(in)lcd_buffer[i]=3;
001d36  4906              LDR      r1,|L1.7504|
001d38  b11c              CBZ      r4,|L1.7490|
001d3a  f04f0203          MOV      r2,#3
001d3e  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
;;;1242   else lcd_buffer[i]=4;	 
;;;1243   }
001d40  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
                  |L1.7490|
001d42  f04f0204          MOV      r2,#4                 ;1242
001d46  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]            ;1242
001d48  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
001d4a  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.7500|
                          DCD      sm_mont
                  |L1.7504|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.7508|
                          DCD      bFL2
                          ENDP

                  long2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1275   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1276   void long2lcdhyx(unsigned long in,char y,char x)
001d58  b517              PUSH     {r0-r2,r4,lr}
;;;1277   {
;;;1278   char i;
;;;1279   char n;
;;;1280   
;;;1281   i=(20*y)+x;
001d5a  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
001d5e  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
001d62  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0
;;;1282   
;;;1283   n=*((char*)&in);
001d64  f89d3000          LDRB     r3,[sp,#0]
;;;1284   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001d68  48ce              LDR      r0,|L1.8356|
001d6a  f003010f          AND      r1,r3,#0xf
001d6e  5c44              LDRB     r4,[r0,r1]
001d70  49cd              LDR      r1,|L1.8360|
001d72  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1285   i--;
001d74  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001d78  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1286   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001d7a  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001d7e  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001d80  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1287   i--;
001d82  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001d86  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1288   
;;;1289   n=*(((char*)&in)+1);
001d88  f89d3001          LDRB     r3,[sp,#1]
;;;1290   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001d8c  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
001d90  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001d92  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1291   i--;
001d94  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001d98  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1292   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001d9a  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001d9e  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001da0  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1293   i--;
001da2  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001da6  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1294   
;;;1295   n=*(((char*)&in)+2);
001da8  f89d3002          LDRB     r3,[sp,#2]
;;;1296   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001dac  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
001db0  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001db2  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1297   i--;
001db4  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001db8  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1298   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001dba  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001dbe  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001dc0  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1299   i--;
001dc2  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001dc6  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
;;;1300   
;;;1301   n=*(((char*)&in)+3);
001dc8  f89d2003          LDRB     r2,[sp,#3]
;;;1302   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001dcc  f002040f          AND      r4,r2,#0xf
001dd0  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001dd2  54cc              STRB     r4,[r1,r3]
;;;1303   i--;
001dd4  f1a30301          SUB      r3,r3,#1
001dd8  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
;;;1304   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001dda  eb001012          ADD      r0,r0,r2,LSR #4
001dde  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
001de0  54c8              STRB     r0,[r1,r3]
;;;1305   i--;
;;;1306   }
001de2  bd1e              POP      {r1-r4,pc}
;;;1307   
                          ENDP

                  pointer_set PROC
;;;1379   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1380   void pointer_set(char num_of_first_row)
001de4  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1381   {
;;;1382   if(sub_ind==index_set)lcd_buffer[num_of_first_row*20]=1;
001de6  49b1              LDR      r1,|L1.8364|
001de8  2401              MOVS     r4,#1
001dea  4baf              LDR      r3,|L1.8360|
001dec  f9912001          LDRSB    r2,[r1,#1]  ; a_ind
001df0  f9911004          LDRSB    r1,[r1,#4]  ; a_ind
001df4  428a              CMP      r2,r1
001df6  d104              BNE      |L1.7682|
001df8  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
001dfc  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]
;;;1383   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+1))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+1)*20]=1;
;;;1384   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+2))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+2)*20]=1;
;;;1385   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+3))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+3)*20]=1;
;;;1386   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+4))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+4)*20]=1;
;;;1387   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+5))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+5)*20]=1;
;;;1388   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+6))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+6)*20]=1;
;;;1389   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+7))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+7)*20]=1;
;;;1390   }
001e00  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.7682|
001e02  1c4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#1              ;1383
001e04  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1383
001e06  d106              BNE      |L1.7702|
001e08  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1383
001e0c  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1383
001e10  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1383
001e14  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.7702|
001e16  1c8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#2              ;1384
001e18  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1384
001e1a  d106              BNE      |L1.7722|
001e1c  f1000002          ADD      r0,r0,#2              ;1384
001e20  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1384
001e24  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1384
001e28  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.7722|
001e2a  1ccd              ADDS     r5,r1,#3              ;1385
001e2c  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1385
001e2e  d106              BNE      |L1.7742|
001e30  f1000003          ADD      r0,r0,#3              ;1385
001e34  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1385
001e38  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1385
001e3c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.7742|
001e3e  1d0d              ADDS     r5,r1,#4              ;1386
001e40  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1386
001e42  d106              BNE      |L1.7762|
001e44  f1000004          ADD      r0,r0,#4              ;1386
001e48  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1386
001e4c  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1386
001e50  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.7762|
001e52  1d4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#5              ;1387
001e54  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1387
001e56  d106              BNE      |L1.7782|
001e58  f1000005          ADD      r0,r0,#5              ;1387
001e5c  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1387
001e60  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1387
001e64  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.7782|
001e66  1d8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#6              ;1388
001e68  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1388
001e6a  d106              BNE      |L1.7802|
001e6c  f1000006          ADD      r0,r0,#6              ;1388
001e70  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1388
001e74  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1388
                  |L1.7800|
001e78  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.7802|
001e7a  1dc9              ADDS     r1,r1,#7              ;1389
001e7c  428a              CMP      r2,r1                 ;1389
001e7e  d1fb              BNE      |L1.7800|
001e80  f1000007          ADD      r0,r0,#7              ;1389
001e84  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1389
001e88  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1389
001e8c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1391   
                          ENDP

                  tree_down PROC
;;;1393   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1394   void tree_down(signed char offset_ind,signed char offset_sub_ind)
001e8e  4b88              LDR      r3,|L1.8368|
;;;1395   {
;;;1396   ind_pointer--;
001e90  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
001e92  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001e96  b212              SXTH     r2,r2
001e98  801a              STRH     r2,[r3,#0]
;;;1397   if(ind_pointer<=0)ind_pointer=0;
001e9a  2a00              CMP      r2,#0
001e9c  dc02              BGT      |L1.7844|
001e9e  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
001ea2  801a              STRH     r2,[r3,#0]
                  |L1.7844|
;;;1398   ind_pointer+=offset_ind;
001ea4  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
001ea6  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
001ea8  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
001eaa  8018              STRH     r0,[r3,#0]
;;;1399   a_ind=b_ind[ind_pointer];
001eac  4a81              LDR      r2,|L1.8372|
001eae  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
001eb2  4402              ADD      r2,r2,r0
001eb4  487d              LDR      r0,|L1.8364|
001eb6  6813              LDR      r3,[r2,#0]
001eb8  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; a_ind
001eba  7912              LDRB     r2,[r2,#4]
001ebc  7102              STRB     r2,[r0,#4]
;;;1400   
;;;1401   sub_ind+=offset_sub_ind;
001ebe  7842              LDRB     r2,[r0,#1]  ; a_ind
001ec0  4411              ADD      r1,r1,r2
001ec2  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1402   }
001ec4  4770              BX       lr
;;;1403   
                          ENDP

                  tree_up PROC
;;;1404   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1405   void tree_up(char tind, char tsub_ind, char tindex_set, char tsub_ind1)
001ec6  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1406   {
;;;1407   b_ind[ind_pointer++]=a_ind;
001ec8  4d79              LDR      r5,|L1.8368|
001eca  f9b54000          LDRSH    r4,[r5,#0]  ; ind_pointer
001ece  f1040601          ADD      r6,r4,#1
001ed2  802e              STRH     r6,[r5,#0]
001ed4  4d77              LDR      r5,|L1.8372|
001ed6  eb040484          ADD      r4,r4,r4,LSL #2
001eda  4425              ADD      r5,r5,r4
001edc  4c73              LDR      r4,|L1.8364|
001ede  6826              LDR      r6,[r4,#0]  ; a_ind
001ee0  602e              STR      r6,[r5,#0]
001ee2  7926              LDRB     r6,[r4,#4]  ; a_ind
001ee4  712e              STRB     r6,[r5,#4]
;;;1408   ind=(i_enum)tind;
001ee6  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]
;;;1409   sub_ind=tsub_ind;
001ee8  7061              STRB     r1,[r4,#1]
;;;1410   index_set=tindex_set;
001eea  7122              STRB     r2,[r4,#4]
;;;1411   sub_ind1=tsub_ind1;
001eec  70a3              STRB     r3,[r4,#2]
;;;1412   }
001eee  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1413   
                          ENDP

                  bgnd_par PROC
;;;1414   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1415   void bgnd_par(char const *ptr0,char const *ptr1,char const *ptr2,char const *ptr3)
001ef0  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;1416   {
001ef4  4680              MOV      r8,r0
001ef6  460f              MOV      r7,r1
001ef8  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;1417   char i,*ptr_ram;
;;;1418   clr_scrn();
001efa  f7fffffe          BL       clr_scrn
;;;1419   
;;;1420   ptr_ram=lcd_buffer;
001efe  4c6a              LDR      r4,|L1.8360|
;;;1421   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001f00  f04f0500          MOV      r5,#0
                  |L1.7940|
;;;1422   	{
;;;1423   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr0++;
001f04  f8180b01          LDRB     r0,[r8],#1
001f08  f8040b01          STRB     r0,[r4],#1
001f0c  f1050501          ADD      r5,r5,#1              ;1421
001f10  b2ed              UXTB     r5,r5                 ;1421
001f12  2d14              CMP      r5,#0x14              ;1421
001f14  d3f6              BCC      |L1.7940|
;;;1424   	}
;;;1425   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001f16  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.7962|
;;;1426   	{
;;;1427   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr1++;
001f1a  f8171b01          LDRB     r1,[r7],#1
001f1e  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001f22  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1425
001f26  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1425
001f28  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1425
001f2a  d3f6              BCC      |L1.7962|
;;;1428   	}
;;;1429   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001f2c  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.7984|
;;;1430   	{
;;;1431   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr2++;
001f30  f8161b01          LDRB     r1,[r6],#1
001f34  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001f38  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1429
001f3c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1429
001f3e  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1429
001f40  d3f6              BCC      |L1.7984|
;;;1432   	}
;;;1433   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001f42  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.8006|
;;;1434   	{
;;;1435   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr3++;
001f46  f8131b01          LDRB     r1,[r3],#1
001f4a  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001f4e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1433
001f52  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1433
001f54  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1433
001f56  d3f6              BCC      |L1.8006|
;;;1436   	}
;;;1437   
;;;1438   
;;;1439   }
001f58  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;1440   
                          ENDP

                  show_mess PROC
;;;1456   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1457   void show_mess(char* p1, char* p2, char* p3, char* p4,int m_sec)
001f5c  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1458   {
001f5e  9c03              LDR      r4,[sp,#0xc]
;;;1459   //bgnd_par(p1,p2,p3,p4);
;;;1460   //tree_up(iSM,sub_ind,sub_ind1,sub_ind2);
;;;1461   //ret((char)(m_sec/100));
;;;1462   show_mess_cnt=(char)(m_sec/100);
001f60  f04f0564          MOV      r5,#0x64
001f64  fb94f4f5          SDIV     r4,r4,r5
001f68  4d53              LDR      r5,|L1.8376|
001f6a  702c              STRB     r4,[r5,#0]
;;;1463   show_mess_p1=p1;
001f6c  4c53              LDR      r4,|L1.8380|
001f6e  6020              STR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; show_mess_p1
;;;1464   show_mess_p2=p2;
001f70  4853              LDR      r0,|L1.8384|
001f72  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p2
;;;1465   show_mess_p3=p3;
001f74  4853              LDR      r0,|L1.8388|
001f76  6002              STR      r2,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p3
;;;1466   show_mess_p4=p4;
001f78  4853              LDR      r0,|L1.8392|
001f7a  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p4
;;;1467   }
001f7c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1468   //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

                  event_data2ind PROC
;;;1495   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1496   void event_data2ind(char num, char simbol)
001f7e  e92d43fe          PUSH     {r1-r9,lr}
;;;1497   {
001f82  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;1498   char iii;
;;;1499   char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;1500   unsigned int tempii;    
;;;1501   		
;;;1502   /*tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
;;;1503   tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));*/
;;;1504   tempii=(signed)num;
;;;1505   tempii*=32;
001f84  ea4f1040          LSL      r0,r0,#5
;;;1506   tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
001f88  f5006080          ADD      r0,r0,#0x400
001f8c  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1507        
;;;1508   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
001f8e  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
001f90  4620              MOV      r0,r4
001f92  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1509   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
001f96  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
001f98  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
001f9c  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1510   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
001fa0  4669              MOV      r1,sp
001fa2  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
001fa6  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1511   
;;;1512   iii=find(simbol);
001faa  4628              MOV      r0,r5
001fac  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1513   
;;;1514   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001fb0  4c3d              LDR      r4,|L1.8360|
001fb2  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
001fb6  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
001fba  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001fbc  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1515   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
001fbe  f04f0730          MOV      r7,#0x30
001fc2  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
001fc6  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001fc8  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1516   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
001fca  f04f0821          MOV      r8,#0x21
001fce  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
001fd2  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001fd4  f8048000          STRB     r8,[r4,r0]
;;;1517   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
001fd8  f04f0940          MOV      r9,#0x40
001fdc  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
001fe0  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001fe2  f8049001          STRB     r9,[r4,r1]
;;;1518   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001fe6  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
001fea  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001fec  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1519   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001fee  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
001ff2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001ff4  5466              STRB     r6,[r4,r1]
;;;1520   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
001ff6  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
001ffa  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001ffc  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1521   lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
001ffe  f04f0223          MOV      r2,#0x23
002002  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002006  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
002008  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
;;;1522   int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
00200a  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]
00200e  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
002012  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
002016  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1523   int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
00201a  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]
00201e  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
002020  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23
002022  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1524   if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
002026  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
00202a  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
00202c  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc
00202e  d303              BCC      |L1.8248|
002030  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
002034  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]
                  |L1.8248|
;;;1525   sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0); 
002038  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
00203c  4923              LDR      r1,|L1.8396|
00203e  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
002040  eb010080          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #2
002044  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
002046  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
;;;1526   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';		
00204a  f1050001          ADD      r0,r5,#1
00204e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002050  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1527   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
002052  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
002056  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
002058  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1528   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
00205a  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
00205e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002060  f8048001          STRB     r8,[r4,r1]
;;;1529   lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
002064  f04f023a          MOV      r2,#0x3a
002068  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00206c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00206e  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
;;;1530   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
002070  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002074  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002076  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1531   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
002078  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00207c  b2cd              UXTB     r5,r1
00207e  f8049000          STRB     r9,[r4,r0]
;;;1532   int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
002082  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
002086  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
00208a  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
00208e  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1533   int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
002092  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
002096  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
002098  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
00209a  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1534      		     		
;;;1535   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
00209e  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1536   }	
0020a0  e8bd83fe          POP      {r1-r9,pc}
                          ENDP

                  |L1.8356|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L1.8360|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.8364|
                          DCD      a_ind
                  |L1.8368|
                          DCD      ind_pointer
                  |L1.8372|
                          DCD      b_ind
                  |L1.8376|
                          DCD      show_mess_cnt
                  |L1.8380|
                          DCD      show_mess_p1
                  |L1.8384|
                          DCD      show_mess_p2
                  |L1.8388|
                          DCD      show_mess_p3
                  |L1.8392|
                          DCD      show_mess_p4
                  |L1.8396|
                          DCD      sm_mont

                          AREA ||area_number.2||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.2||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_m PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000004  4614              MOV      r4,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da04              BGE      |L2.20|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  ea6f0000          MVN      r0,r0
00000e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
000012  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L2.20|
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
000028  d022              BEQ      |L2.112|
00002a  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002e  4d12              LDR      r5,|L2.120|
000030  4a12              LDR      r2,|L2.124|
                  |L2.50|
000032  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
000034  d202              BCS      |L2.60|
000036  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000038  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
00003a  e011              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.60|
00003c  d108              BNE      |L2.80|
00003e  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000042  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000044  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
000048  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
00004a  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
00004e  e007              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.80|
000050  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000052  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000054  d004              BEQ      |L2.96|
000056  b164              CBZ      r4,|L2.114|
000058  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
00005c  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L2.96|
000060  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000064  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000066  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00006a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00006c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00006e  d3e0              BCC      |L2.50|
                  |L2.112|
000070  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L2.114|
000072  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000074  e7f4              B        |L2.96|
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000076  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L2.120|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L2.124|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.3||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.3||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_mm PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460c              MOV      r4,r1
000004  4615              MOV      r5,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da02              BGE      |L3.16|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  f1c00000          RSB      r0,r0,#0
00000e  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L3.16|
000010  f04f062d          MOV      r6,#0x2d
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002a  4a1a              LDR      r2,|L3.148|
00002c  4c1a              LDR      r4,|L3.152|
                  |L3.46|
00002e  b97d              CBNZ     r5,|L3.80|
000030  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000032  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000034  d00c              BEQ      |L3.80|
000036  1857              ADDS     r7,r2,r1
000038  787f              LDRB     r7,[r7,#1]
00003a  2f20              CMP      r7,#0x20
00003c  d106              BNE      |L3.76|
00003e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
000040  d104              BNE      |L3.76|
000042  eb040c00          ADD      r12,r4,r0
000046  4637              MOV      r7,r6
000048  f80c7c01          STRB     r7,[r12,#-1]
                  |L3.76|
00004c  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
00004e  e017              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.80|
000050  42a9              CMP      r1,r5
000052  d202              BCS      |L3.90|
000054  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000056  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000058  e012              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.90|
00005a  d108              BNE      |L3.110|
00005c  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000060  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000062  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000066  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000068  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00006c  e008              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.110|
00006e  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000070  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000072  d004              BEQ      |L3.126|
000074  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000078  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00007c  e000              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.126|
00007e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
                  |L3.128|
000080  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000084  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000086  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00008a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00008c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00008e  d3ce              BCC      |L3.46|
000090  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000092  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L3.148|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L3.152|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.4||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.4||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdh PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000004  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000006  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4a07              LDR      r2,|L4.40|
00000c  f004010f          AND      r1,r4,#0xf
000010  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000012  4906              LDR      r1,|L4.44|
000014  540b              STRB     r3,[r1,r0]
000016  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  eb021214          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSR #4
000020  7812              LDRB     r2,[r2,#0]
000022  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
000024  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000026  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L4.40|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L4.44|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.5||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.5||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdhyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00000c  4a06              LDR      r2,|L5.40|
00000e  f000030f          AND      r3,r0,#0xf
000012  5cd4              LDRB     r4,[r2,r3]
000014  4b05              LDR      r3,|L5.44|
000016  545c              STRB     r4,[r3,r1]
000018  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00001c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00001e  eb021010          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSR #4
000022  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
000024  5458              STRB     r0,[r3,r1]
000026  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L5.40|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L5.44|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.6||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.6||, ||.text||
                  int2lcdhyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00000c  4b0f              LDR      r3,|L6.76|
00000e  f000020f          AND      r2,r0,#0xf
000012  4c0f              LDR      r4,|L6.80|
000014  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
000016  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
000018  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00001c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00001e  ea4f1210          LSR      r2,r0,#4
000022  f002000f          AND      r0,r2,#0xf
000026  5c18              LDRB     r0,[r3,r0]
000028  5460              STRB     r0,[r4,r1]
00002a  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00002e  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000030  ea4f1112          LSR      r1,r2,#4
000034  f001020f          AND      r2,r1,#0xf
000038  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
00003a  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
00003c  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000040  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000042  ea4f1111          LSR      r1,r1,#4
000046  5c59              LDRB     r1,[r3,r1]
000048  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
00004a  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L6.76|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L6.80|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.7||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.7||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdbyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2cc              UXTB     r4,r1
00000c  4921              LDR      r1,|L7.148|
00000e  f0000201          AND      r2,r0,#1
000012  5c8d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r2]
000014  f1a40201          SUB      r2,r4,#1
000018  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
00001a  4a1f              LDR      r2,|L7.152|
00001c  5515              STRB     r5,[r2,r4]
00001e  ea4f0450          LSR      r4,r0,#1
000022  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
000026  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000028  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
00002c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00002e  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000030  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000034  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
000038  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00003a  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
00003e  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000040  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000042  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000046  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00004a  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
00004c  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000050  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000052  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000054  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000058  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
00005c  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00005e  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
000062  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000064  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000066  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
00006a  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00006e  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000070  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000074  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000076  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000078  ea4f0354          LSR      r3,r4,#1
00007c  f0030401          AND      r4,r3,#1
000080  5d0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r4]
000082  f1a00401          SUB      r4,r0,#1
000086  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
000088  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
00008a  ea4f0053          LSR      r0,r3,#1
00008e  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
000090  5510              STRB     r0,[r2,r4]
000092  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L7.148|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L7.152|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.8||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.8||, ||.text||
                  show_mess_number PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  e9dd4606          LDRD     r4,r6,[sp,#0x18]
000006  9d05              LDR      r5,[sp,#0x14]
000008  f04f0764          MOV      r7,#0x64
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000c  fb95f5f7          SDIV     r5,r5,r7
000010  4f07              LDR      r7,|L8.48|
000012  703d              STRB     r5,[r7,#0]
000014  4d07              LDR      r5,|L8.52|
000016  6028              STR      r0,[r5,#0]  ; show_mess_p1
000018  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.56|
00001a  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p2
00001c  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.60|
00001e  6002              STR      r2,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p3
000020  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.64|
000022  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p4
000024  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.68|
000026  8004              STRH     r4,[r0,#0]
000028  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.72|
00002a  7006              STRB     r6,[r0,#0]
00002c  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

00002e  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L8.48|
                          DCD      show_mess_cnt
                  |L8.52|
                          DCD      show_mess_p1
                  |L8.56|
                          DCD      show_mess_p2
                  |L8.60|
                          DCD      show_mess_p3
                  |L8.64|
                          DCD      show_mess_p4
                  |L8.68|
                          DCD      show_mess_number_
                  |L8.72|
                          DCD      show_mess_komma
